General.Name: Alltop Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Alltop Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the designing, manufacturing, and selling of electrical connectors worldwide. The company offers notebook pc, mini and micro HDMI, high power, high speed, F cable, and USB 3.1 type-C connectors, as well as high frequency, power, and transmitting speed connectors for medical equipment, industrial PC, automotive, consumer, and other applications. It also designs and makes fine-pitches and low-profile electrical connectors. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 102, Jhongshan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
